channel.title: Bronzescape [Delta - Allstar] Project
channel.description:
Hello, I'm Blddyboy, Myself and my Friend are currently working on a project too make a Delta source into a Allstar source not with similar codes the Allstar source will have Delta coding.
We will be posting pictures on here and tell you how good and far we are getting.
I will most likely be accepting help as we don't know if we will get finished as fast as we want too, So if you wanna join us you can private message me here, If you wanna join us you'll need too be skilled in one of these traits...
-Java Coding. -Website Developer. -Client Coder. -Gfx Designer.
I will make regularly updates too this post.

item.title: Bronzescape [Delta - Allstar] Project
item.dc:creator: @blddyboy blddyboy
item.description:
@blddyboy wrote:

Well it would be for them to work on plus, It would be worth it I don’t want to just have them help me for nothing I feel like I’m cheep and can’t afford things when I can’t get my staff stuff but I can get myself a vps, It will also be worth all their hard work.

Read full topic

item.title: Bronzescape [Delta - Allstar] Project
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“blddyboy, post:3, topic:445751”]Well you get a spot on a staff list, We give you benefits if I get this running I was planning too buy all my staff a vps and let the staff member use that too do whatever. We are right now planning out stages of what we will do and we are planning who has too do what we will let the people who can help us join now and we will let others join later.

That was a good question by the way, I thank you for asking it.[/quote]

I suggest you don’t give them a VPS, that’s just asking for staff advertisement ;).

Either way, good luck.

Read full topic
